welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Isidro! Get ready to be charmed by our quaint town known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as Centennial Terminal, it is exclusively used by Philippine Airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as Manila Domestic Passenger Terminal, it serves domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.
